patterns: Can you tell me the status of my order?

patterns: How can I return a product?
I want to return my order
How do I process a return?
responses: You can return a product within 30 days of purchase. Please visit our returns page for more details.
To return an item, please fill out the return form on our website and follow the instructions.
Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.
Please visit our returns and refunds page for detailed instructions.
We offer standard and express shipping options. Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days.
Yes, we offer express shipping for an additional cost. Delivery is usually within 2-3 business days.
Shipping costs vary based on your location and the shipping method chosen. Please check our shipping page for more details.
Yes, we ship internationally. Shipping rates and times vary depending on the destination.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?

responses: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and other major payment methods.
Yes, you can pay with PayPal during the checkout process.
We accept all major credit cards including Visa, MasterCard, and American Express.
Currently, we do not offer cash on delivery. Please use one of our other payment methods.
